Title: Jeweler
Important Commands: shape, cut, add
Syntax: "shape my bar", "cut my gem", "add my gem to my clasp"
As a jeweler, you have the ability to create various pieces of jewelry using metals and gems.
First, you need to acquire a jeweling knife and a bar of metal. Once you have these you can use the command $(udat.chatchar) SHAPE [BAR] to see a list of available options (this list is based on your level of skill in the career and will add more options as you learn more). You can '$(udat.chatchar) SHAPE [BAR] INTO CHAIN and then $(udat.chatchar) SHAPE CHAIN to get a list of options for what you can make from that chain.
To cut gems, you must acquire a jeweler's polishing machine and a gem. The command is then $(udat.chatchar) CUT [GEM] and you will get a list of options. You can then $(udat.chatchar) CUT [GEM] INTO [STYLE] (whatever style you choose).
Some items are more complicated to create, and they are listed here to aid you:
Earrings: You must first$(udat.chatchar) SHAPE [BAR] INTO POSTS. Then cut a gem and$(udat.chatchar) ADD [GEM] TO POSTS. You now have a pair of earrings.
Necklaces: You must first $(udat.chatchar)SHAPE [BAR] INTO CHAIN. Now, $(udat.chatchar) SHAPE CHAIN INTO NECKLACE and$(udat.chatchar) SHAPE [BAR] INTO CLASP. $(udat.chatchar) CUT your gem into whatever style you prefer, and $(udat.chatchar) ADD [GEM] TO CLASP. Your gem is now a pendant. Now $(udat.chatchar) ADD PENDANT TO NECKLACE. Congratulations! You now have a necklace.
For further assistance seek out fellow jewelers in game.
